Layer.UpdateScoreMessageCommand: %function(self) local ass = loot_scoreDisplay if ass >= 10000 then local str = string.format('%05d', ass); local digit = string.sub(str, 1, 1); self:setstate(tonumber(digit)); else self:setstate(10) end end
